Trade/Device Name(s): VITEK® 2 Gram Positive Ertapenem for Streptococcus pneumoniae
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Devices
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITEK 2 Gram Positive Ertapenem antimicrobial susceptibility test for Streptococcus pneumoniae using VITEK 2 and VITEK 2 Compact platforms
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative antimicrobial susceptibility testing of Streptococcus pneumoniae using VITEK 2 and VITEK 2 Compact Systems to aid laboratory determination of in vitro susceptibility to antimicrobial agents
